Indio.Fantasy Springs Resort Casino: Fantasy Springs Resort Casino is a casino and hotel located south and east of Palm Springs, California near I-10 in Indio, California. It is owned and operated by Cabazon Band of Mission Indians, a federally recognized tribe. The hotel has 250 rooms and the casino consists of 2000 slot machines and video poker, 40 tables, and 100,000 sq ft (9,300 m2) of special events center space.
